IP_SYN_0_style_1:
Indication: RLL obstruction.
Anesthesia: Conscious sedation (Fentanyl/Versed).
Procedure:
- Scope passed.
- Findings: Diffuse tracheobronchitis, thick yellow mucus plugs bilaterally.
- Action: Extensive suctioning of mucous plugs to clear airways (31645).
- Wash: RLL lateral segment lavage performed.
Complications: None.
